tileentity.line: if(nbt['mID']==32013){return YELLOW+nbt['height']+GOLD+' 层'+ "\\n"+"§d最低-mKeV:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+AQUA+standards((nbt['mFloor']/1000000).toFixed(0))+GOLD+' mKeV'+ "\\n"+"§d当前-mKeV:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+YELLOW+standards((nbt['mKeV']/1000000).toFixed(0))+GOLD+' mKeV'+ "\\n"+"§d最高-mKeV:"+TAB+ALIGNRIGHT+RED+standards((nbt['mCeil']/1000000).toFixed(0))+GOLD+' mKeV' }
if(nbt['mFluidMode']==1){return GOLD+'输出金液'} if(nbt['mFluidMode']==0){return WHITE+'输出面粉'}
if(nbt['inputSeparation']==1 && nbt['mID']!=13106){return GREEN+'开启'} if(nbt['inputSeparation']==0 && nbt['mID']!=13106){return RED+'关闭'}

if(nbt['isFluidLocked']==1){return judge(1)}
if(nbt['voidExcessEnabled']==1){return Mode('溢出销毁')}
if(nbt['mID']==32014 && nbt['mStorageCurrent']>0){return AQUA+fluidName(nbt['mFluidName'])}
if(nbt['mID']==32014 && nbt['mStorageCurrent']>0) {return YELLOW+((nbt['mStorageCurrent']/nbt['mStorage'])*100).toFixed(0)+AQUA+' %'}

if(nbt['wireless_mode']==1 && nbt['wireless_mode']!=undefined){return GREEN+'蓝波顿开无线,你就等着§c§l看烟花§a罢'} if(nbt['wireless_mode']==0 && nbt['wireless_mode']!=undefined){return GREEN+'杂鱼~杂鱼~无线都开不起的杂鱼~'}
if(nbt['eID']>=0 && nbt['mID']==15441){return GOLD+nbt['eID']}
if(nbt['mMuffler']==1){return GREEN+'憋叭叭了'}

if(nbt['isInRitualMode']==0){return RED+'无穷无尽的掉落物'} if(nbt['isInRitualMode']==1){return GREEN+'无穷无尽的LP'}
if(nbt['mIsProducingInfernalDrops']==0){return RED+'爷不想要奇怪的装备'} if(nbt['mIsProducingInfernalDrops']==1){return GREEN+'勇猛的榨精者会填满你的AE'}
if(nbt['voidAllDamagedAndEnchantedItems']==0){return RED+'你可曾听到ME元件的哀嚎'} if(nbt['voidAllDamagedAndEnchantedItems']==1){return GREEN+'好一似食尽鸟投林'}
if(nbt['mID']==1172){return YELLOW+(nbt['mEfficiency'] / 100).toFixed(0)+AQUA+" %"}
